---

# Generate Access Token

Before you can use the MVola API, you need to generate an access token.

```bash title="Execute"
mvola generateToken
```

```json title="Response"
{
  "access_token": "eyJ4NXQiOiJPRE5tWkRFMll6UTRNVEkxTVRZME1tSmhaR00yTUdWa1lUZGhOall5TWpnM01XTmpNalJqWWpnMll6bGpNRGRsWWpZd05ERmhZVGd6WkRoa1lUVm1OZyIsImtpZCI6Ik9ETm1aREUyWXpRNE1USTFNVFkwTW1KaFpHTTJNR1ZrWVRkaE5qWXlNamczTVdOak1qUmpZamcyWXpsak1EZGxZall3TkRGaFlUZ3paRGhrWVRWbU5nX1JTMjU2IiwiYWxnIjoiUlMyNTYifQ..ensjXEFaOLOZBd6l1_zVvOuQmC9Flsq00WErcCzGfqHYpWjtIKrVlSGN0FMTAQ-aTMzl166jUZOrsDmhp7Kp4DfN_aD5Br2gE98D1tY3U7-m0mQ757ZgaSY-mcmDOs6MVg3k6OmQqYghX4PCC6f8H5cqlmZV0D44GsDb0pNGx5sBDh4q6DI7Zu8QMfbR758ezeEhAL43EbCAnemf9BotIfzHGlwjbiK71IFFwuCMQze81swKwQerK32Ey4uPXnBngXGHYwo4PqhVIHzzBHOxNIlc_MmUO5M_qG3Az1EQbQj6GX2RKM39cEgk8GXJrDtvgEA0fU_VkrV54twAEqtKEA",
  "scope": "EXT_INT_MVOLA_SCOPE",
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "expires_in": 3600
}
```
